channel.title: 562 Client can't login, but can connect fine
channel.description:
Hi guys, Please give me a hand! :(
My server runs on 562 (Not sure on the server type but I think it's 562 loading 614 or 604) and for some reason the client doesn't seem to connect very well. The client loads and I can see all the worlds in the worlds list for my server but I can't connect to them through the login page. It just stops for a moment on Performing login... and says 'Error connecting to server'. After the client connects I get a message in the server window saying 'Please initialize the log4j system properly', Could this be preventing clients from connecting? The port forwarding is fine I used port scanners and they detect the server just fine.
The only thing I can think of is that I didn't put my IP in the client correctly. I checked on client.java and it's correct, is there any other places it needs to be? EDIT: What about Class_a.java?
Thanks, Gergy. xWeedscape

item.title: 562 Client can't login, but can connect fine
item.dc:creator: @gergy008 gergy008
item.description:
@gergy008 wrote:

I don’t understand why noone will help me, this thread has been up ages…

Read full topic
